lyrics:
9 contributorsstupid lyricsverse 1
plays you like a fiddle shakes you like a rattle
takes away your gun and sends you into battle
huffs and it puffs til it blows your house down
and you dont know your heart from a hole in the ground

prechorus
whoa oh
whoa oh

chorus
stupid love is stupid
dont know why we always do it
finally find it just to lose it
always wind up looking stupid stupid

verse 2
girl meets boy and boy hes a looker
cant separate the salt from the sugar
theres nothing in your pockets theres footprints on your face
you cant tell anymore if youre the rabbit or the snake hey

prechorus
whoa oh
whoa oh
you might also likechorus
stupid love is stupid
dont know why we always do it
finally find it just to lose it
always wind up looking stupid stupid

bridge
i drink to feel
i smoke to breathe
just look what love
has done to me

chorus
stupid love is stupid
dont know why we always do it
finally find it just to lose it
always wind up looking so damn
stupid love is stupid
dont know why we always do it
finally find it just to lose it
always wind up looking stupid stupid6embed
